DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether Tamuslosin is effective in the treatment of lower urinary tract syndrome with female patients.
DOC.brief_title: Tamsulosin Phase III Clinical Trial -Double-Blind, Placebo Controlled Study in Female Patients With Lower Urinary Tract Syndrome
DOC.criteria: Patients with urination disorder not accompanied by apparent organic or neurologic abnormality(lower urinary tract syndrome: LUTs)ï¼Ž Patients with urination disorder accompanied by apparent organic or neurologic abnormality, active urinary tract infections, severe cardiovascular, hepatic and/or kidney complications.
